Hi. Thanks for taking a look at my portfolio. Some of the projects that are featured here are labors of love and other were paid projects. I'm currently available for freelance work.

Message Me

Countdown to Christmas

Web Design/Development

Website: Countdown to Christmas

Source code available on my GitHub repo.

Created by myself using semantic HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JavaScript.

This was a personal project. The inspiration for this project come from my kids who were always asking how many days there are until Christmas day. Feel free to fork and contribute to this project.

Cuts By Us

Web Design/Development/Social Media

Website: www.cutsbyusphilly.com

Created by myself using a customized WordPress theme.

Cuts By Us was a barber shop located in the historic Germantown section of Philadelphia, PA. The owner of the business wanted a web site that would primarily serve two purposes. First, the local business wanted to establish a web presence (the owner has been in business since 2000 and has never had a web site) and second, serve as a virtual help-wanted ad. I was solely responsible for the ongoing maintenance of the website as well as their social media presence and activity.

Petite Gourmet

Web Design/Development

Website: www.petitegourmetpa.com

Created by myself using a customized WordPress theme.

Petite Gourmet is a school lunch catering service based out of Philadelphia, PA. This website was built using a customized child theme on the WordPress CMS platform. The client was a local small business that required a website to promote and sell catering services.

10 Tips to Become a Better Web Developer

Web Design/Development

Website: Become a Better Web Developer

Source code available on my GitHub repo.

Created by myself using semantic HTML5, CSS3 and vanilla JavaScript.

This was a personal project. This ongoing project of mine is a testament to my personal list of previous accomplishments and future goals. I am continuously learning and honing my craft so each tip is followed. Feel free to fork and contribute to this project.
